alicat7667: Someone once told me “ your outsides don’t match your insides “ ...meaning what I was feeling was NOT what I was showing ...that comment has stuck with me for 15 years ...

julia.church: A few weeks ago I experienced one of those passing comments from a friend that I’m starting to realize is maybe a giant pointer finger from the universe so I wrote it on a post-it and stuck it on my bathroom mirror. And now I’m making a conscious effort to notice those giant pointer fingers from the universe when they’re still just passing comments. And I’m holding onto them because I’m realizing I need to be open to whatever direction the universe is pointing me in.
